tool_description: API to serve information about stars and planets scraped from Wikipedia. Get to know over 200 stars and surrounding planets, in just a few lines of code.

api_list.name: Star
api_list.description: Returns full information about a specific star.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the star.

api_list.name: Planet list
api_list.description: Returns the planets surrounding a specific star.

optional_parameters.name: starid
optional_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the star whose planets are to be retrieved.
